text: Crossostylis is a genus of trees in the family Rhizophoraceae. ==Species== * Crossostylis grandiflora Pancher ex Brongn. & Gris * Crossostylis multiflora Brongn. & Gris ex Pancher & Sebert * Crossostylis sebertii Pancher ex Brongn. & Gris ==References== Category:Rhizophoraceae Category:Malpighiales genera
title: Crossostylis
